sentences.en: " There'll be just one brief skirmish and the Yankees will skedaddle back into Tennessee.
sentences.cn: " 只要打一次小小的遭遇战,北方佬就会逃回田纳西去的.

sentences.en: A conventional skirmish would escalate into a nuclear exchange.
sentences.cn: 传统的小规模战斗更有可能逐步升级为核战争.

sentences.en: A minor skirmish ensued as people fought over supplies.
sentences.cn: 由于争抢供给品而引发了一场小冲突.

sentences.en: Border skirmishes between India and Pakistan were common.
sentences.cn: 印巴边境的小冲突曾经是常有的事。

sentences.en: Everybody but Toby enters into this skirmish.
sentences.cn: 除了托比外,全家人都投入了这场小冲突.

sentences.en: Guatemala was the first skirmish of the cold war in Latin America.
sentences.cn: 危地马拉是冷战在拉丁美洲的首个发生地.

sentences.en: He was shot in a skirmish with the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他在与敌人的一次小冲突中被击中.

sentences.en: Last November's election was a skirmish - hardly even a battle, still less a war.
sentences.cn: 去年11月份的选举只是个小冲突 —— 几乎算不上一场战役, 更别提是场战争了.

sentences.en: She confessed that she had directed an attack, called in French a skirmish, before Paris.
sentences.cn: 她承认她在巴黎城前发起过进攻, 呼唤法国人投入战斗.

sentences.en: So a skirmish could escalate into a war of mutual survival.
sentences.cn: 所以一场小小冲突也可能激化为双方余下的人员之间的战争.

sentences.en: The skirmish grew into a major battle.
sentences.cn: 小冲突扩大形成大战斗.

sentences.en: The verbal skirmish is viewed as the opening round in negotiation schedules to start next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 这场争论被看作预定下星期二举行的谈判的序幕.

sentences.en: There had been a skirmish in the half light of dawn.
sentences.cn: 天朦朦亮的时候曾经有过一场小规模的战斗.

sentences.en: They were skirmishing close to the minefield now.
sentences.cn: 他们当时正在雷区附近小规模交火。

sentences.en: This skirmish sparked a major battle.
sentences.cn: 这次小冲突激起了场大战斗.

sentences.en: This was a only petty , front - line skirmish.
sentences.cn: 这只是前沿阵地上小小的交锋.

sentences.en: We won a skirmish, and we'll win him some more.
sentences.cn: 我们打赢了一场小仗, 还要再给他打赢几仗.

trans.tran_cn: 小规模战斗，小争论，小冲突，[体]〈美〉比赛
trans.tran_en: a fight between small groups of soldiers, ships etc, especially one that happens away from the main part of a battle – used in news reports

trans.tran_cn: 参与小争斗，进行小争论，搜索，侦察
进行小规模战斗，发生小争论
